Text: Beer Die TournamentPST BEER DIE TOURNAMENT When Fri the th and Sat the th This Weekend We will start friday night at pm for seating and the tournament will take place saturday night for the glory at the same time You need to have a team by friday in order to play in the tournament You can sign up on the sheet on the front door or either email me or drop a note in my box with you and your partners name on it If you do not sign up by friday then you will not be allowed to play on saturday You can either bring your own booze or chip in some cash for booze here at the house Pledges and alumni are highly encourged to play
